::SnowCat:;

She smiled slightly."Again, I thank you.  I do hope they are 
functional."  She walked with him. "You know, I have never met 
another bot until today.  Your the first gentle bot that I have ever 
had the pleasure to meet.  I thank you again for you help."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramulus::
> 
> Ramulus smiles at SnowCat. "You're welcome. It's all in a day's 
work."
> 
> He turns around again, walking off, "I'm not sure if the CR 
chambers are 
> functioning properly, but I think they would be."
